Rulings.Tengu: ‚óèThe effect to Special Summon starts a Chain. If you control a monster when this effect resolves or your opponent controls no monsters when this effect resolves, you will not Special Summon a monster.

Rulings.Base: 1. The effect to Special Summon starts a Chain.\n2. If you control a monster when this effect resolves or your opponent controls no monsters when this effect resolves, you will not Special Summon a monster.
